resources.string: Welcome to Flummoxed! Crack the 5 digit code using the feedback and logic"
"In Intermediate, this feedback is temporary. You must rely on memory and logic to solve"
"In Expert, this feedback not given. Logically find the answer from your guesses"
Get a win streak of 5 to unlock the next difficulty level
Intermediate mode unlocked from main menu
Expert mode unlocked from main menu
